Title: Step 1: Finding the Museum
Text: I need to visit the War Museum at the Gramados Arsenal Factory to start my journey towards obtaining the Marksmanship License (ML). The museum is renowned for its vast collection of historical weapons and the legacy of marksmanship in Gramados. I should find the museum and speak with Curator Evelyn Marston.
CompleteText: I've found the War Museum at the Gramados Arsenal Factory. Now, I need to speak with Curator Evelyn Marston to learn more about the history and responsibilities of marksmanship.
NextQuestTitle: Step 2: Speaking with Curator Evelyn Marston
